function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of information dissemination for prevention measures and safety procedures","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and non-compliance with regulations","Mitigation":"Regular and clear communication of prevention measures and safety procedures in public places","Technologies":"Digital display screens, augmented reality, public announcement systems","People":"General public","Owner":"City authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Underutilized public spaces leading to a lack of essential services and support for essential sectors","Impact":"Inability to meet the needs of essential sectors and communities during outbreak events","Mitigation":"Flexible zoning and planning for temporary uses, collaboration with essential service providers","Technologies":"Zoning regulations, spatial planning tools, collaboration platforms","People":"Essential service providers, local communities","Owner":"City authorities, community organizations"},{"Description":"Increased risk of community disease transmission due to shared facilities in public places","Impact":"Accelerated spread of contagious diseases within the community","Mitigation":"Implementing restrictions on shared facilities, increased sanitation and hygiene measures","Technologies":"Access control systems, automated sanitation systems, crowd management tools","People":"General public, facility managers","Owner":"City authorities, facility management companies"}]}
